name: Red Velvet Cinnamon Roll Frappuccino
instruction:
● Mocha Frappuccino made with half regular mocha sauce and half white mocha sauce
● Add cinnamon dolce syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Add raspberry syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)

name: Mr and Mrs Vampire Frappuccinos
instruction:
● Mr. Vampire Frappuccino
●  Mocha Frappuccino
● Mocha Sauce on the bottom of cup
● Strawberry Puree drizzled on top
● Top with whipped cream
●  Mrs. Vampire Frappuccino
●  Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino
● Mocha Sauce on the bottom of cup
● Strawberry Puree drizzled on top
● Top with whipped cream

name: Bubble Gum Frappuccino
instruction:
● Strawberries and Creme Frappuccino
● No classic syrup (unless you like it sweet)
● Add Raspberry syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 pumps for a grande, 3 pumps for a venti)

name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Frappuccino
instruction:
● White Mocha Frappuccino
● Add Cinnamon Dolce syrup (1 pump for tall, 1.5 for grande, 2 for venti)
● Add Hazelnut syrup (1 pump for tall, 1,5 for grande, 2 for venti)
● Cinnamon sugar blended in
● Top with whipped cream and more cinnamon sugar

name: Caramel and Nut Chocolate Bar Frappuccino
instruction:
● Java Chip Frappuccino
● Add toffee nut syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 pumps grande, 3 pumps venti)
● Caramel drizzle in the cup and on top

name: Teddy Grahams Frappuccino
instruction:
● Start with a Coffee Frappuccino
● Add Cinnamon Dolce Syrup (1 pump tall, 2 pumps grande, 3 pumps venti)
● Add Vanilla Syrup (1/2 pump tall, 1 pump grande, 1.5 pumps for a venti)
● Add honey

name: Cinnamon Roll Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
● Add white mocha syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 for grande, 3 for venti)
● Add cinnamon dolce syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 for grande, 3 for venti)
● Top with cinnamon dolce powder

name: Narwhal Frappuccino
instruction:
● Blended Strawberry Lemonade
● Add vanilla bean powder
● Top with whipped cream and green tea matcha powder

name: Pokémon Go Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
● Add raspberry syrup
● Add freeze dried whole blackberries
● Top with whipped cream

name: Christmas Cookie Frappuccino
instruction:
● Start with a creme base Frappuccino
● Add Peppermint Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)
● Add Toffee Nut Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)
● Top with whipped cream and a raw sugar packet sprinkled on top
● Optional: Top with caramel drizzle

name: Unicorn Frappuccino
instruction:
● Crème base Frappuccino
● Mango Syrup
● Colored with unicorn pink powder
● Blue Drizzle made from white mocha, classic syrup and sour unicorn blue powder
● Top with whip and sprinkle with blue and pink unicorn dust

name: Triple Berry Cobbler Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
● Add white mocha syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Add raspberry syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande and venti)
● Add freeze dried blackberries (1 scoop tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Add blueberries (1 packet tall, 2 grande, 2 venti)
● Double blend and top with whipped cream

name: Butterscotch Frappuccino
instruction:
● Creme Base
● Add Pumpkin Spice Sauce (1 for tall, 2 grande, 3 for venti)
● Add Caramel syrup (1 for tall, 2 grande, 3 for venti)
● Add Hazelnut syrup  (1 for tall, 2 grande, 3 for venti)
● Top with whipped cream and caramel drizzle

name: Dragon Frappuccino
instruction:
● Green Tea Frappuccino
● Add vanilla bean powder
● Swirl of berry syrup at the bottom of cup
● Top with whip and purple sprinkles
● Optional: Add coconut syrup

name: Crystal Ball Frappuccino
instruction:
● Marbled with gem drizzle
● Made with peach tea infusion
● Topped with peach whipped cream and candy gem topping in your color choice of purple, blue or green

name: Stardust Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
● Add blackberries
● Blended with sangria

name: Cherry Blossom Frappuccino
instruction:
● Strawberries and Crème Frappuccino
● Line the cup with drizzle made from white mocha sauce and matcha powder
● Top with whipped cream and matcha powder

name: Frappula Frappuccino
instruction:
● Mocha sauce on the bottom of cup
● White chocolate sauce, milk and ice blended together
● Finish with a drizzle of raspberry syrup and whipped cream on top

name: Cake Batter Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
● Add Hazelnut Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti) 
● Alternate recipe:
● If you’re a fan of Starbuck’s Cake Pops, try asking your store if they are able to blend a cake pop into your drink. Not all Starbucks locations will do this, but it doesn’t hurt to ask!
● Blend a Birthday Cake Pop into a Vanilla Bean Frappuccino for a Birthday Cake Frappuccino!

name: Samoa Cookie Frappuccino
instruction:
● Mocha Coconut Frappuccino
● 2 pumps of caramel syrup
● Ask for extra coconut flakes to be blended into the drink

name: Polyjuice Potion Frappuccino
instruction:
● Cherry Blossom Frappuccino (Strawberries and Crème Frappuccino with drizzle lining the cup made from white mocha sauce and matcha powder)
● Add espresso (1 shot tall and grande, 2 venti)
● Add vanilla syrup (1 pump tall, 1 ½ grande, 2 venti)

name: DunkAroos Frappuccino
instruction:
● Start with a crème based Frappuccino
● Heavy cream or whole milk recommended for consistency
● Add vanilla bean powder (1 scoop tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Add cinnamon dolce syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Add white mocha syrup (1 pump tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)
● Top with whip and cinnamon dolce topping
● Optional: Add java chips (1 scoop tall, 2 grande, 3 venti)

name: Skittles Frappuccino
instruction:
● Strawberries and Crème Frappuccino
● No classic syrup
● Add Vanilla Syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 pumps grande, 4 pumps venti)
● Add Raspberry Syrup (½ pump tall, 1 pump grande, 1.5 pumps venti)

name: Count Chocula Frappuccino
instruction:
● Whole milk to the first line
● Add vanilla bean powder (2 scoops tall, 3 grande, 4 venti)
● Add marshmallow syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 grande, 2 venti)
● Add mocha syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 grande, 2 venti)
● Top with whipped cream and optional mocha drizzle

name: Peanut Butter Cup Frappuccino
instruction:
● Mocha Frappuccino
● Add toffee nut syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 grande, 4 venti)
● Made with soy instead of whole milk
● Add whip and top with mocha drizzle
